INIKA Bakuchiol Serum Natural Retinol Alternative

Brand: Inika

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Squalane (Olive Derived), Bakuchiol

Directions: After cleansing, massage 2-3 drops into face and neck (day + night)

Warnings: Shake well. Patch test recommended. Store below 30°C.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity
ies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
